[#每日任務]9月13日要推嘅tweet
1. UN Special Procedures: UN experts react with alarm to reports of attacks on demonstrators, arrests of activists & #HumanRights defenders, and threats to communications, as protests in #HongKong continue. They urge #China to respect protesters’ rights https://twitter.com/UN_SPExperts/status/1172134235844554753?s=19

2. Kevin McCarthy (凱文·麥卡錫，美國眾議院少數黨領袖):
America is more than a country—it’s an idea. An idea that puts power in the hands of the PEOPLE. That's why we stand with the people of Hong Kong in their pursuit of freedom from a communist government.
https://twitter.com/GOPLeader/status/1171545537016991746?s=19
Our hearts are with the people of Hong Kong. America must solemnly promise to stand with them in their struggle for freedom. https://twitter.com/GOPLeader/status/1171844256354504704?s=19

3. Simon Henderson(澳洲人權律師): I have made a submission to Australian Parliament inquiry on #AHKFTA in a personal capacity.
Shows how #humanrights & #ruleoflaw concerns in #HongKong can be better reflected in the FTA, esp via enforceable human rights clause.
https://twitter.com/simjhenderson/status/1172058614200070145?s=21

4. Dick Durban(迪克·德賓，美國民主黨係參議院入面第二高職務): Proud to cosponsor the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, which Congress should pass as soon as possible to express U.S. support for the democratic aspirations of the people of Hong Kong.
https://twitter.com/SenatorDurbin/status/1172202951894589440?s=19

5. Times: Listen to the song that Hong Kong's youthful protesters are calling their "national anthem" https://twitter.com/TIME/status/1172215843096289282?s=19

6. 之鋒: We hope for more and more people who live in mainland China to recognise the importance of universal values and freedom. Three decades ago, the Berlin Wall fell, and we hope that in the future, the great firewall of China will also fall.” https://twitter.com/joshuawongcf/status/1172184421644013573?s=19
It’s time to depart Berlin and travel to NY. Thank you for politicians, journalists and people live in Germany paying attention to HK's protest, which is our honour to hold PC at Bundespressekonferenz. Our voice is being heard. HKers never walk alone. @GlacierCKwong @yikmowong https://twitter.com/joshuawongcf/status/1172107421994631175?s=19

7. Kyle Bass: The Failed Hong Kong government is going to get a “firework show” on October 1st whether they like it or not. @ezracheungtoto #WeStandWithHongKong #HKexit #DieCCP
https://twitter.com/Jkylebass/status/1172347534234259456?s=19

8. Edward Markey(艾德·馬基，美國聯邦參議員):
I wrote to Facebook to ask why it continues to run ads like these from state-controlled media organizations. Outlets based in mainland China continue to cast protestors as extremists and undermine faith in journalism. https://twitter.com/SenMarkey/status/1172189422785376257?s=19

9. France24(法蘭西24): 📷 Hong Kong protests at day 100. . The protests began in June in response to a bill that would have allowed people to be sent to mainland China for trial. . While the bill has now been withdrawn, the protests have widened with key demands including an… https://twitter.com/France24_en/status/1172496546614525952?s=19

10. CNN International: The London Stock Exchange has roundly rejected Hong Kong's $37 billion takeover bid. https://twitter.com/cnni/status/1172496676646510597?s=19

每日任務：

4. 夜晚十點咆哮！（改9點會少好多人）
5. 健身+運動，身體健康，鬥長命

8. 保持獨立思考，分析能力level up，冷處理fake news/ rumour 、五毛分化post

每星期任務：
1. 低消費，高儲蓄；罷買Bye Buy Day：星期日、星期五(唔買非必需品）
2. 做孝子救港，關心下老母老豆老人家，自己老母自己救
